name: High-Five!
description:
High-Five!

It takes two to tango.

Join blue guy and his counterpart red gal as they puzzle their way through 8 levels featuring several neat mechanics such as blocks, spikes and switching platforms!

Features include:

  • Eight unique levels.
  • Activate your special move the High-Five! to effect world objects.
  • Difficult and satisfying handmade puzzles.

Standard platformer controls, WASD or arrow keys to move and space to jump. You can also press R to reset the level.

Enjoy!

Feedback appreciated.

This game was made for the course Advanced Game Design and Development in Reykjavik University, spring 2020.
